Class eqGraph

Equation Graph

Fun class that requires the GD libraries to give visual output of an equation to the user. Extends the eqEOS class.

eqEOS
eqGraph

public Null
# graph( String $eq, Integer $xLow, Integer $xHigh, Float $xStep, Boolean $xyGrid = false, Boolean $yGuess = true, Integer $yLow = false, Integer $yHigh = false )

Create GD Graph Image

Create GD Graph Image

Creates a GD image based on the equation given with the parameters that are set

Parameters

$eq
String
$eq Equation to use. Needs variable in equation to create graph, all variables are interpreted as 'x'
$xLow
Integer
$xLow Lower x-bound for graph
$xHigh
Integer
$xHigh Upper x-bound for graph
$xStep
Float
$xStep Stepping points while solving, the lower, the better precision. Slow if lower than .01
$xyGrid
Boolean
$xyGrid Draw gridlines?
$yGuess
Boolean
$yGuess Guess the upper/lower yBounds?
$yLow
Integer
$yLow Lower y-bound
$yHigh
Integer
$yHigh Upper y-bound

Returns

Null

# outJPG( )

Sends JPG to browser

Sends a JPG image with proper header to output

Sends PNG to browser

Sends PNG to browser

# getImage( )

Output GD Image

Output GD Image

Will give the developer the GD resource for the graph that can be used to store the graph to the FS or other media
